verbs.description: Three Korean - Americans who [V: were] detained in North Korea for more than a year were greeted by President Donald Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S. early Thursday .

[ARG1: Three Korean - Americans] [R-ARG1: who] were [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: for more than a year] were greeted by President Donald Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S. early Thursday .
